Henry B. Walthall https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_B._Walthall 0 Henry Brazeale Walthall (March 16, 1878 – June 17, 1936) was an American stage and film actor. He appeared as the Little Colonel in D. W. Griffith's The Birth of a Nation (1915). Henry_Brazeale_Walthall ( March_16_,_1878 – June_17_,_1936 ) was an_American_stage_and_film_actor . He appeared as the_Little_Colonel in D._W._Griffith 's_The_Birth of a_Nation_(_1915_) .
